title: 20 Clear Signs Your Twin Flame Is Trying to Contact You

steps.title: You could feel tingling, warmth, or pressure.
steps.content: You could feel tingling, warmth, or pressure. You’ll likely experience these sensations when you first meet because of the powerful energy between you. You may also feel dizzy or experience pain in your heart chakra. The feelings will likely subside once your relationship becomes more stable. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Your twin flame will often leave clues in your dreams.
steps.content: Your twin flame will often leave clues in your dreams. You might even have the same dream repeatedly. When you’re asleep, you’re completely relaxed and open to receiving signs from the universe. Because your twin flame is trying to send you messages, these dreams are likely to be vivid and symbolic. Look for any significant symbols or meanings that may provide insight into your relationship with your twin flame, including dates or places and things that remind you of them.

steps.title: You’ll gain strength and clarity.
steps.content: You’ll gain strength and clarity. When your twin flame reaches out to you, you’ll feel strong and ready to take on new challenges. You’re totally at peace with yourself and have forgiven yourself for your past mistakes. You’ve let go of the past and are ready to step into the future with your twin flame.

steps.title: You'll see or hear things that remind you of them.
steps.content: You'll see or hear things that remind you of them. This could include angel numbers or images that are significant to you in some way. You may even repeatedly hear a song that reminds you of your twin flame. Pay attention to any repeating signs as they may help you strengthen your connection with your twin flame. These numbers often tell you something about your twin flame. For example, seeing the number eight repeated could mean your twin flame was born in August or you could meet them on the eighth day of the month.

steps.title: The universe will force you in the right direction.
steps.content: The universe will force you in the right direction. You might experience a career change, job loss, or a sudden end to a relationship. If your life feels like it’s changing all at once, this could be a sign that the universe is sending you to your twin flame. [2] X Research source

steps.title: You’ll explore things you’ve never been interested in before.
steps.content: You’ll explore things you’ve never been interested in before. When your twin flame is trying to reach out, you may feel drawn to new experiences. You’ll suddenly want to travel to a new place or try out a new hobby you’d never cared about. These are likely things your twin flame is interested in, and you’re picking up on their energy.

steps.title: You’ll connect with your spirituality on a deeper level.
steps.content: You’ll connect with your spirituality on a deeper level. When your twin flame communicates with you, you feel ready for a change. You have a sense of validation and completion, and you’ve been connecting with your spiritual side. You might be drawn to yoga, meditation, or prayer. You appreciate everything the universe has given you and eagerly await your twin flame connection. [3] X Research source

steps.title: You’ll miss your twin flame before you’ve even met them.
steps.content: You’ll miss your twin flame before you’ve even met them. Even when all else seems to be going well, you might feel a deep sense of yearning for your twin flame. When you feel this sensation, your twin flame is calling to you. You’re likely sending out a signal to them as well, and through this cycle, you two will come together. [4] X Research source

steps.title: You can't keep them off your mind.
steps.content: You can't keep them off your mind. You might be having a normal conversation with friends or family, and the topic suddenly changes to include your twin flame. This could be by name or by a place or activity that reminds you of them. Your conversation will change direction, and you’ll know your twin flame is trying to make space for themselves in your life. [5] X Research source

steps.title: You’ll want new things in life.
steps.content: You’ll want new things in life. You may suddenly lose interest in material things, or maybe you’ll have the desire to start a family. You might also finally feel ready to do something you’re scared of. If you’re experiencing these changes, your twin flame is trying to bring out your potential. [6] X Research source

steps.title: You’ll feel like you can read their mind.
steps.content: You’ll feel like you can read their mind. With just a glance, you’ll know exactly what they’re thinking and feeling, and vice versa. You and your twin flame understand each other better than anyone else and can communicate spiritually.

steps.title: Everything in your life will suddenly make sense.
steps.content: Everything in your life will suddenly make sense. Because you and your twin flame are fated to be together, the universe will start leading you to each other. It may feel like everything is going right in your life and that you’re finally on the right path. [7] X Research source

steps.title: You’ll feel an unexplained sense of reassurance.
steps.content: You’ll feel an unexplained sense of reassurance. If you’ve been going through a hard time and suddenly feel comforted, there’s a good chance this is your twin flame reaching out to help you. Your bond can help you resolve personal issues and grow into a better version of yourself.

steps.title: You’ll feel like you’ve done this all before.
steps.content: You’ll feel like you’ve done this all before. When your twin flame is trying to communicate with you, you might feel like you’ve lived certain experiences before. You may even feel like you already know your twin flame when you meet. Experiencing déjà vu is a common sign you’re on the right path to connect with your twin flame. [8] X Research source

steps.title: You might sense them even if they aren’t there.
steps.content: You might sense them even if they aren’t there. When your twin flame calls to you, it can sometimes feel like they’re wrapping their arms around you, even if you haven’t met yet. This is because your energies have synced, and you’ll likely meet them soon.

steps.title: Twin flame connections are felt strongly on the spiritual plane.
steps.content: Twin flame connections are felt strongly on the spiritual plane. Meditation allows you to clear your mind and increase your energy vibrations. This often allows your twin flame to communicate with you and helps bring you closer together.

steps.title: You’ll become more attuned to your surroundings.
steps.content: You’ll become more attuned to your surroundings. You may feel more sensitive to the energies around you and pick up on feelings you otherwise wouldn’t notice. These could be your own emotions or those of the people around you. This awareness shows that your twin flame is reaching out, and you’re ready to receive them. [9] X Research source

steps.title: You may find yourself smiling or laughing for no reason at all.
steps.content: You may find yourself smiling or laughing for no reason at all. Because you and your twin flame are on the same energy level, this is likely because you’re feeling their emotions alongside them. You might also feel their negative emotions, but when you’re smiling randomly, just remember it’s probably because they’re thinking of you. [10] X Research source

steps.title: Your twin flame might talk to you in your mind.
steps.content: Your twin flame might talk to you in your mind. You may hear a specific voice calling your name or telling you they love you. This is a common sign your twin flame is thinking about you. Because your energies are connected, they can easily share their thoughts with you through your mind. [11] X Research source

steps.title: Sometimes, your twin flame communicates through a psychic.
steps.content: Sometimes, your twin flame communicates through a psychic. Psychics are attuned to the spiritual realm, so they often pick up on twin flame connections and can even provide messages from your twin flame. If a psychic tells you your twin flame is reaching out, it’s likely true. [12] X Research source
